short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Power Up your work with AI

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension created by romantha.ai.
Romantha is an Artificial Intelligence platform for your company's data.

The extension aims to Reduce Disruptions. By working directly within the browser, users can access the platform's inference capabilities while remaining focused on the task at hand, minimizing distractions from having to navigate away from their workflow.
